name: Almond Blossom Tapple
description: [list][*]This exquisite Tapple captures the delicate beauty of almond blossoms in full bloom, reminiscent of the iconic artwork by Vincent van Gogh. The Almond Blossom Tapple is inspired by van Gogh's famous painting [i]Almond Blossoms[/i], created in 1890 as a gift for his nephew and namesake. The painting is celebrated for its vibrant depiction of almond tree branches set against a clear blue sky, symbolizing hope and new beginnings.[*]No longer drops in-game.[*]Set: Canvas Legends[*]Rarity: [color=#00FF00]Uncommon[/color][/list]

name: Pearl Tapple
description: [list][*]This exquisite Tapple features [i]Girl with a Pearl Earring[/i], a masterpiece by Dutch Baroque painter Johannes Vermeer. Born in 1632 in Delft, Netherlands, Vermeer is celebrated for his use of light and color, capturing the girl's enigmatic expression and iconic pearl earring. This painting, often called the [i]Mona Lisa of the North[/i], showcases Vermeer's skill in creating intimate and captivating portraits.[*]No longer drops in-game.[*]Set: Canvas Legends[*]Rarity: [color=#00FF00]Uncommon[/color][/list]

name: Gothic Tapple
description: [list][*]This Tapple features the iconic painting [i]American Gothic[/i] by Grant Wood, created in 1930. The artwork is famous for its depiction of a stern-looking farmer holding a pitchfork and a woman standing beside him, set against the backdrop of a rural American home. The painting captures the essence of American Midwest life during the Great Depression, symbolizing resilience and simplicity.[*]No longer drops in-game.[*]Set: Canvas Legends[*]Rarity: [color=#00FF00]Uncommon[/color][/list]

name: Vanitas Tapple
